short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyboard shortcuts for fullscreen, pausing, muting, volume controls and skipping to the video player of the European HBO sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Full-screen: F
- Play/pause: Space
- Toggle mute: M
- Skip forward/backward: Left and right arrow keys
- Volume up/down: Up and down arrow keys

Supported sites:

- HBO Nordic
- Experimental support for the HBO Europe sites

Like this extension? Buy me a coffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/andrelaszlo
